          '*   CAfile: /internal/shared/ca-bundle.crt\n' +
          '  CApath: none\n' +
          '* OpenSSL SSL_connect: SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL in connection to www.oopcee.com:8000 \n' +
          '* Closing connection 0\n'
      },
      source: 'request'
    }
  }
}
